LightningComponentBundle.description: Lightning flow component that scans a barcode and returns the captured text.

property.name: scannedBarcode
property.label: Scanned barcode text
property.description: Variable in which to store the scanned barcode text.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button label
property.description: The label on the button that initiates the barcode scan.

property.name: successMessage
property.label: Success message
property.description: A message that will appear in a toast when the barcode is successfully scanned.
